data.current_summary: Transform API Descriptions from/to various formats
data.current_description: Transform API Descriptions from/to various formats e.g., Swagger, API Blueprint, RAML, WADL, Google Discovery, I/O Docs.
data.summary_suggestion: Convert API descriptions between multiple format standards
data.description_suggestion: Converts API descriptions from one format to another, supporting multiple industry-standard formats including Swagger/OpenAPI, API Blueprint, RAML, WADL, Google Discovery, Postman Collections, and others. Accepts the source API description and target format as inputs. Returns the converted API description in the requested format. Supports bidirectional conversion between compatible formats. Validates input format and returns error details if conversion fails.
